attributes.action: persuade Sir Alan Sugar to be an independent advisor for the government for the purpose of vetting all existing and future MP’s  and cabinet members to see if they are suitable to run a country, and if not to take suitable action in his own way.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
